GK19jalmugau:212: dṛṣṭvā deśam aśeṣam ā jalanidher ālokya kautūhalād $ āsthānīr avanībhṛtāṃ ca punar apy āgatya deśaṃ nijam &
GK19jalmugau:213: kāruṇyāt taruṇaṃ janaṃ prati satām abhyarthanābhis tathā % so 'yaṃ
GK19jalmugau:214: saṃprati Jalhaṇena kavinā Mudghopadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ // JMu_65 //
GK19jalmugau:217: asmākaṃ sura-sindhu-rodhasi punaḥ śaṃbhāva-daṃbhā1rcanair % vṛddhatvasya viśuddhatāṃ janayituṃ kartavya-śeṣaḥ sthitaḥ // JMu_66 //
